questions.question: Who was the king in the story?
questions.answer: The king in the story went forth into the world and fetched back a beautiful queen.

questions.question: What did God give to the king and queen?
questions.answer: God gave them a little daughter.

questions.question: Why was there great rejoicing in the city and country?
questions.answer: The people wished their kind and just king all that was good.

questions.question: Who entered the room while the child lay in its cradle?
questions.answer: A strange-looking old woman entered the room.

questions.question: What did the old woman say about the princess?
questions.answer: The old woman said that the princess must not be allowed out under the open sky until she was full fifteen years of age.

questions.question: Why did the king post guards to watch over the little princess?
questions.answer: To ensure that she would not get out under the open sky, as the old woman warned about the mountain troll.
